message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for a limited time at the special price of $150.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for what it offers!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. Would you consider selling it to me for $140?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the quality of this product is truly top-notch.  How about we meet in the middle at $145?
I understand the value of the product, Alice, but I would like to propose a price closer to my budget. Could you consider selling it to me for $140?
